xml.title: MAU Flow By Date
xml.description:
This report shows the net MAU growth based on installs, reacts and quitters by date for a selected game and or client for a specified date range.
o Quitters - users who have had no activity in a game for 30 days o Reacts - users who were quitters who now have activity o Installs - new users
xml.parm: select distinct game_id, game_name from lookups.l_flurry_game order by 2
